version_description:
WINTER WONDERLAND: Winter has come to Tom’s World. Celebrate the holidays in style!
NEW SPECIAL CHARACTERS: Hyper Tom and Cyber Angela are ready for action.
NEW DAILY MISSIONS: Daily missions redesign with bigger rewards for daily players.

TOM CELEBRATES IN CHINA: Party with Talking Tom at one of the biggest celebrations in China!
NEW SPECIAL MISSIONS: Collect special Chinese themed items to complete the new daily missions.
NEW PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION: Get the new premium membership to access the exclusive character, Agent Tom, and enjoy an exciting variety of special offers.
Bug fixes and minor gameplay improvements.

NEW WORLD - HANK ON HAWAII!
Try out the new running world on Hawaii with Hawaiian Hank!
NEON LIGHTS AND CITY SIGHTS!
Join Talking Tom and run together with him in fabulous Las Vegas!
RUN FAST WITH COWBOY TOM
Yeehaw, a new special character awaits! Run together with Cowboy Tom into the sunset!

WILD WEST: Join the run with Talking Tom and have a true frontier experience.
WILD NEW MISSIONS: Complete all the exciting new missions and become a Wild West legend.

WILD WEST: Join the run with Talking Tom and have a true frontier experience.
WILD NEW MISSIONS: Complete all the exciting new missions and become a Wild West legend.

VALKYRIE ANGELA: Embark on a legendary quest with a brand new character.
WEEKEND SPECIAL: Get a sneak peek of new worlds for free.

VALKYRIE ANGELA: Embark on a legendary quest with a brand new character.
WEEKEND SPECIAL: Get a sneak peek of new worlds for free.

RACING CONTEST: Beat two competitors and win the gold.
PIRATE GINGER: Say arrr to the new character.
SIDE WORLDS: Zigzag through the medieval side world.

RACING CONTEST: Beat two competitors and win the gold.
PIRATE GINGER: Say arrr to the new character.
SIDE WORLDS: Zigzag through the medieval side world.

RACING CONTEST: Beat two competitors and win the gold.
PIRATE GINGER: Say arrr to the new character.
SIDE WORLDS: Zigzag through the medieval side world.

COWBOY ANGELA: Run the robber out of town!
NEW SIDE WORLD: Be the best in the Wild West!
WILD WEST MISSIONS: Kick up some desert dust!

COWBOY ANGELA: Run the robber out of town!
NEW SIDE WORLD: Be the best in the Wild West!
WILD WEST MISSIONS: Kick up some desert dust!

FIREMAN TOM: Faster than a fire blaze.
DAILY CONTEST: Every day a new chance for a big reward!
SIDE WORLD: Catch your destiny in Cyber City!

FIREMAN TOM: Faster than a fire blaze.
DAILY CONTEST: Every day a new chance for a big reward!
SIDE WORLD: Catch your destiny in Cyber City!

NEW CHARACTER: Scare the robber away with Zombie Ben!
HALLOWEEN: Tom’s world gets spooky.
NEW SIDE WORLD: Sugar rush in Candy World.

SPLASHY TOM: Make a splash and catch the robber!
SIDE WORLD: Splash and dash through the Water Park.

SANTA’S VILLAGE: Celebrate in the charming Santa’s Village.
HOLIDAY MAKEOVER: Tom’s default world gets Christmas goodies.
Bug fixes and minor gameplay improvements.

KUNG FU HANK: Don’t let anything stop you!
SNOWBOARDING: Race down the hill and through the halfpipe on a snowboard.
CHINESE CELEBRATION: Get ready to party in Tom’s default world!

KUNG FU HANK: Don’t let anything stop you!
SNOWBOARDING: Race down the hill and through the halfpipe on a snowboard.
CHINESE CELEBRATION: Get ready to party in Tom’s default world!

PRINCESS ANGELA: Shine brighter than gold with this brand new character!
MEDIEVAL WORLD: Swoosh and whoosh around the winding streets of Medieval Town.
Bug fixes and minor gameplay improvements.

ASTRONAUT TOM: Reach for the stars and go for the gold!
WACKY PLANET: Explore the wonders of this brand new side world!
NEW RACING CHALLENGE: Collect water to win!

WILD WEST: Explore this desert side world.
COWBOY MISSIONS: Don’t miss the Wild West pick-ups!

FOOTBALL TOM: Grab the chance to be a champion!
NEW CHALLENGE: Score goals to win rewards!
FOOTBALL IN TOM’S WORLD: Football frenzy takes over Tom’s running world!

FOOTBALL TOM: Grab the chance to be a champion!
NEW CHALLENGE: Score goals to win rewards!
FOOTBALL IN TOM’S WORLD: Football frenzy takes over Tom’s running world!

CYBER CITY: Explore the shiny streets of this futuristic side world.
FUTURISTIC MISSIONS: Pick up sci-fi props as you race to finish the new daily missions!

CYBER CITY: Explore the shiny streets of this futuristic side world.
FUTURISTIC MISSIONS: Pick up sci-fi props as you race to finish the new daily missions!

BOSS FIGHT: Take down the robber and claim your gold!
IRON BEN: Switch to superhero mode!
WEEKLY RACING: Want cool rewards? Race to the top of the leaderboard!

BOSS FIGHT: Take down the robber and claim your gold!
IRON BEN: Switch to superhero mode!
WEEKLY RACING: Want cool rewards? Race to the top of the leaderboard!
Bug fixes and minor gameplay improvements.

NEW SIDE WORLD: Cruise through with cool skateboard moves!
SKATER ANGELA: Own the street in style!
CHINESE MOON FESTIVAL: Have fun with the new pick-ups and decorations!

NEW SIDE WORLD: Cruise through with cool skateboard moves!
SKATER ANGELA: Own the street in style!
CHINESE MOON FESTIVAL: Have fun with the new pick-ups and decorations!

WITCH ANGELA: New Halloween character!
PUMPKIN PARTY: Spooky decorations in Tom’s world!
CANDY SIDE WORLD: Trick or treat time!

WITCH ANGELA: New Halloween character!
PUMPKIN PARTY: Spooky decorations in Tom’s world!
CANDY SIDE WORLD: Trick or treat time!

PUMPKIN PARTY: Spooky decorations in Tom’s world!
CANDY SIDE WORLD: Trick or treat time!

EXPLORE THREE SIDE WORLDS! Skating, Wacky Planet and Wild West!
Collect pumpkins and get Halloween treats!
Unlock the secret legend of Mummy Tom!

RUN AND CELEBRATE! China comes to Tom’s world!
Explore three side worlds: Skating, flying and Wild West!

SWIM, FLY AND SKATE - Discover three amazing side worlds!
Fly the magic carpet plane with Genie Angela!

UNDERSEA SIDE WORLD: Chase the raccoon underwater!
NEW CHARACTER: Would you dare to swim with Shark Hank!
UNDERWATER MISSIONS: Dive deep for undersea pick-ups!

THE SKATEBOARD’S BACK! Own the streets in style on your skateboard!
DAILY DEALS: Don’t miss out on awesome daily deals!
SKATEBOARD MISSIONS: Collect skateboard pick-ups!

NEW MINING CART RIDE: Go on a crazy Wild West journey!
SUPER GINGER: A new superhero’s in town!
COWBOY MISSIONS: Don’t miss the Wild West pick-ups!

NEW LOST CITY WORLD! Go on an ancient running adventure!
Celebrate good fortune with Lucky Angela!
Enjoy winter in Snowboard World and Santa’s Village!

NEW LOST CITY WORLD! Go on an ancient running adventure!
Celebrate good fortune with Lucky Angela!
Enjoy winter in Snowboard World and Santa’s Village!

FLY THROUGH SPACE! Amazing new side world to explore!
Unicorn Angela - Become a star!

Look out for two NEW limited-time events coming soon:
Flower Power - Can you collect enough flowers to unlock a new character?
Sea Stars - Collect Starfish to unlock Splashy Tom and Shark Hank!

Two new time-limited events to try:
Unlock cowboy characters in the Wild West event!
Play the Cops and Robbers event and collect delicious donuts!

Two new time-limited events to try:
Unlock cowboy characters in the Wild West event!
Play the Cops and Robbers event and collect delicious donuts!

Two new time-limited events to try:
Unlock superhero characters in the Fantastic Forces event!
Compete in the Sports League event and rack up your whistle tokens to get rewards!

Prepare for a new time-limited event:
Collect masks and unlock Carnival Angela in the Masquerade Ball event!
Discover a new sideworld - Surf the Venice Canals!
Look out for special events with amazing rewards coming soon! Quickly, run now to collect them all!

Prepare for a new time-limited event:
Collect masks and unlock Carnival Angela in the Masquerade Ball event!
Discover a new sideworld - Surf the Venice Canals!

Join the celebration of the Moon Festival!
Collect full moons and enjoy amazing rewards, including Lucky Angela & General Tom!
Play the new time-limited event now!

It’s that spooky time of the year again! Play the limited-time event: Halloween Treats!
Collect as many pumpkins as you can and get cool rewards like Mummy Tom and Witch Angela.

JOIN THE NEON RUSH EVENT
Collect batteries and win out-of-this-world rewards. Hyper Tom and Cyber Angela are waiting!

SPECIAL EVENT
Catch the Fortune Festival and collect red envelopes to unlock Lucky Angela and General Tom!

SPECIAL EVENT
Catch the Fortune Festival and collect red envelopes to unlock Lucky Angela and General Tom!
Look out for special events with amazing rewards coming soon! Quickly, run now to collect them all!
Look out for special events with amazing rewards coming soon! Quickly, run now to collect them all!

A SHINY NEW EVENT ARRIVED!
Play the MAGIC WISH event and collect Ancient Jewels for the chance to unlock Genie Angela and Valkyrie Angela.

EXCITING SIDE WORLDS
Make a splash in the Water Park, explore new frontiers in the Wild West and travel all the way to Outer Space!

Chase the raccoon underwater!
Play special events to collect tokens and earn rewards.

A SPOOKY SPECIAL
Celebrate Halloween with spooky outfits, decorations and rewards.
